title: WHIRLING F3 / BARRED DOOR INSIDE
description: From the inside, the door opens easily.

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "This is the barred door you tried t..."
dialogueTree.english: This is the barred door you tried to kick in before.
dialogueTree.polish: To zabarykadowane drzwi, które próbowałeś wcześniej wyważyć kopniakiem.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Гэта забарыкадаваныя дзверы, якія ты спрабаваў раней выбіць нагой.

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "This is the inside of the barred do..."
dialogueTree.english: This is the inside of the barred door you've seen before.
dialogueTree.polish: To wewnętrzna strona zabarykadowanych drzwi, które widziałeś wcześniej.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Гэта ўнутраная частка забарыкадаваных дзвярэй, якія ты бачыў раней.

dialogueTree.title: Barred Door: "The door is small but heavy-looking..."
dialogueTree.english: The door is small but heavy-looking. It's barred from the inside.
dialogueTree.polish: Drzwi są niewielkie, lecz wyglądają na ciężkie. Są zablokowane od wewnątrz.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Дзверы невялікія, але выглядаюць на цяжкія. Яны заблакаваны знутры.

links.title: You: "Lightly punch the door once more. J..."
links.english: Lightly punch the door once more. Just in case.
links.polish: Uderz jeszcze raz lekko drzwi pięścią. Tak na wszelki wypadek.
links.belarusian: Стукні яшчэ раз па дзвярах кулаком. На ўсялякі выпадак.

links.title: Barred Door: "The door shudders a bit, as though..."
links.english: The door shudders a bit, as though it were laughing at you.
links.polish: Drzwi odrobinkę drżą, jakby się z ciebie naśmiewały.
links.belarusian: Дзверы трошкі дрыжаць, нібыта смяюцца з цябе.

links.title: You: ""So what's on the other side?""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unless we've veered off into a fol..."
links.english: "Unless we've veered off into a folded M dimension, I'm expecting to step out on the roof."
links.polish: „O ile nie zboczyliśmy do złożonego wymiaru M, to spodziewam się za nimi dachu”.
links.belarusian: "Калі мы не збочылі ў складанае вымярэнне M, то чакаю за імі дах".

links.title: Conceptualization: "Folded M dimension. A reference to..."
links.english: Folded M dimension. A reference to the popular science fiction series *In System*. Look who's in a good mood suddenly (and reads science fiction).
links.polish: Złożony wymiar M. Odniesienie do popularnej serii science fiction *W systemie*. Proszę, proszę, ktoś tu jest nagle w dobrym humorze (i czytuje science fiction).
links.belarusian: Складаны вымяр М. Спасылкі на папулярны навукова-фантастычны серыял *У сістэме*. Калі ласка, калі ласка, хтосьці раптам у добрым настроі (і чытае навуковую фантастыку).

links.title: Inland Empire: "Yes. It *is* quite likely that we w..."
links.english: Yes. It *is* quite likely that we will re-emerge on the M-Plain. Brace for psychokinetic impact. (Or the roof.)
links.polish: Tak, to całkiem *możliwe*, że trafimy do wymiaru M. Przygotuj się na uderzenie psychokinetyczne (albo na dach).
links.belarusian: Так, цалкам *магчыма*, што мы патрапім у вымярэнне М. Падрыхтуйся да псіхакінетычнага ўдару (ці на дах).

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unless we've veered off into a fol..."
links.english: "Unless we've veered off into a folded M dimension, I'm expecting to step out on the roof -- we could ask Klaasje about this route, see how she reacts?"
links.polish: „O ile nie zboczyliśmy do złożonego wymiaru M, to spodziewam się za nimi dachu. Może zapytamy o to przejście Klaasje? Aby zobaczyć, jak zareaguje”.
links.belarusian: "Калі мы не збочылі ў складаны вымярэнне M, то чакаю за імі дах. Можа, спытаем Кляйсэ пра гэты пераход? Каб убачыць, як яна зрэагуе".
